post_title: Looking for display frames for T206 cards?
post_content:
Greetings..
Are you looking for a better way to display your pre-war cards? I was looking for something besides shelves for slabs and couldn't find a good solution... so I created this bespoke design for tobacco cards, to let your collection shine instead of being stuck in a book...
Please check it out:

[url]www.martimar-cards.com[/url]

.. and feel free to email with questions... I just launched the site last month so everything is on sale... would love any feedback or suggestions...

Thanks!

Craig

[url]martimar-cards@hotmail.com[/url]
